CustomField.formula:
IF(amc__Non_Billable__c = TRUE, 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price"), amc__Cost_Budget__c - (amc__Amount_Invoiced__c - amc__Total_Credited__c), IF(ISPICKVAL( amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price + Expenses"), amc__Cost_Budget__c - (amc__Amount_Invoiced__c - (amc__Expenses_Invoiced__c + amc__Total_Credited__c)) , IF(ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Controlled on Milestones"), amc__Cost_Budget__c - (amc__Amount_Invoiced__c - amc__Total_Credited__c), (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c + IF(amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c > amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c, amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c - amc__Expenses_Invoiced__c)) - (amc__Amount_Invoiced__c - amc__Total_Credited__c)))))
/*If Non Billable is TRUE, display zero. Otherwise, if Fixed Price, Project Budget - (Amount Invoiced - Amount Credited). If Fixed Price + Expenses, Project Budget - (Amount Invoiced - (Expenses Invoiced + Amount Credited). If Controlled on Milestones, Project Budget - (Amount Invoiced - Amount Credited). If Time & Materials, (Scheduled Hours Value (Billable) + (Greater of Anticipated Project Expenses or Actual Project Expenses - Expenses Invoiced) - (Amount Invoiced - Amount Credited)*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the value remaining to be invoiced for this project. If Billing Type = Fixed Price, Project Budget - Total Invoiced otherwise Hours Scheduled Value (Billable) - Total Invoiced
CustomField.label: Total Remaining
